segments.text: Do you know anyone who â€™ s had plastic surgery ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean like a breast enlargement ? I don't think that's really necessary . That's not the way a woman should stay attractive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? Why can't we go back to the way things were ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because ... I don't know . But , Connie , you wouldn't do that , would you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , Liz . Be open-minded ! Look at my eyes , they are puffy . And my eye bags , they are dark and loose and full of lines and circles . I really hope surgery can wipe out the tired feelings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But what would other people think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't care what other people think . I am ready for a lift .
segments.speaker: S1
